channel.title: Removing the Duel Option
channel.description:
I am using Devolution v7 and would like to know how to remove the Duel option.
For Examplte:
Attack Sexytime Trade Sexytime [s]Duel Sexytime[/s]
Lol, Help is greatly appreciated.
Thanks

item.title: Removing the Duel Option
item.dc:creator: @sexytimee sexytimee
item.description:
@sexytimee wrote:

Ooh thanks a bunch. I compiled and didn’t get any errors

Read full topic

item.title: Removing the Duel Option
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

Search for:

		outStream.writeString("Trade with");

You’ll see this:

outStream.writeString("Trade with"); outStream.endFrameVarSize(); outStream.createFrameVarSize(104); outStream.writeByteC(2); outStream.writeByteA(0); outStream.writeString("Duel"); outStream.endFrameVarSize(); outStream.createFrameVarSize(104); outStream.writeByteC(3); outStream.writeByteA(0); outStream.writeString("Attack"); outStream.endFrameVarSize();

Delete this part:

outStream.writeString("Duel"); outStream.endFrameVarSize(); outStream.createFrameVarSize(104); outStream.writeByteC(3); outStream.writeByteA(0); outStream.writeString("Attack"); outStream.endFrameVarSize();

That will also delete the annoying attack option from out of wilderness.

If that doesnt work, try deleting the 3 lines above it, 1 by one, Been a few weeks since I deleted it, so I forgot

Read full topic
